text: Hello, my name is Eira Singhal and I'm currently pursuing MPEG in CDS at ISC Bandler and here

in ML and data science fields.

And also I've covered several courses related to deep learning and computer vision.

localization and classification of skin diseases with focus on explainable AI.
Strings are concerned.
